Text: Could you upload 'Yes Man', 'Boy in the striped Pyjamas', 'The Hangover'?

Just wanted to say I love the great variety of movies and television shows you offer for the PSP. Also, most are very well seeded which is of course awesome.

If you ever decided to convert Glee I'd be all over it, I simply can't find a version to play on my PSP. So, there's that for your consideration even though you have a bajillion other requests to work on.
